author: frankbille
msg: Changed fix of 1543832 so it uses internalDetach instead of onDetach.
Added support for getInputStream in MockHttpServletRequest. Use addFile to simulate adding of uploading files to the request. This is useful for testing file upload.

author: jdonnerstag
msg: wip: This is the next iteration for MarkupFragment and the attempt to harmonize the way we render
components and how we handle ajax calls.
All core components which required changes e.g. Border, Panel, Page, ListView/Item, Loop/LoopItem have been
updated (need to implement an interface with one method). Hence Repeaters etc will fail and throw an exception for now.
